title: HoP 155 - Matter over Mind - Ibn Gabirol
itunes:title: HoP 155 - Matter over Mind - Ibn Gabirol
description: Neoplatonism returns in Ibn Gabriol, who controversially holds that everything apart from God has both matter and form.
